bark & brush

grooming with love

Welcome to Bark & Brush

where your dog's happiness is our priority.

We are Lina and Emma, two dedicated dog lovers committed to providing top-notch grooming services in a caring and stress-free environment. From soothing baths to stylish trims, we ensure every pup leaves our salon looking and feeling their best. Schedule a grooming session today and let us pamper your furry best friend!
